description: I am a Computer Application Professional. My core expertise area is Web (UI/Front-end) Development.

I have over 10+ years of relevant experience works with consumer facing, highly scalable and performant websites development includes 5 years in overseas experience across country like USA with overall 14 years of experience.

I accomplishes multiple roles from Developer to Lead...like 'UI Team Lead', 'UI Technical Lead', 'Senior Software Engineer', 'Web Developer/Front-end Developer/UI Developer' during my professional career growth.
I am a Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) from SCRUM ALLIANCE.
